import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Button, Card, ListGroupItem } from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import axios from 'axios' function ProductScreen() { // const { id } = useParams(); // const product = products.find((p) => p._id === id) const [product, setProduct] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { async function fetchProduct() { const { data } = await axios.get('/api/products/') setProduct(data) } fetchProduct() }, []) return (
Go Back {/* this is a list of product details beside the photo*/}

{product.name}

 Price: ${product.price} Description: {product.description} {/* this card lists price, availablity and 'add to cart' button */} Price: ${product.price} Availablity: {product.countInStock > 0 ? 'In Stock' : 'Out of Stock'}
) } export default ProductScreen
